entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dereference of a managed function pointer is not invariant #91846
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'gtOper < GT_COUNT' during 'VN-based dead store removal' #91839
  • JIT: "Mismatch in align instruction" in superpmi-replay #91838
    8.0.0
  • Do not edit the file if the function is centered #91837
  • Failure in building devcontainer with tag v7.0.9. #91836

Closed

  • Windows service stops with `KERNELBASE.dll` fault after user-handled exception when using outdated packages in .NET 7 #91447
    9.0.0
  • Social Security Account Info. AI Synching Connection Breaking illegal hacking & cipher www.login.gov/(...)_biometry/ECIP :: {§§} :: WILLFUL INFRINGEMENT eCFR :: §§ :: @HAL(L)EX *'©'* Pseudodatis©'° encryption CODEMedia©`°DNACoding HollingerDerekWarren(.) my Project© Organization© ;_& ©Entity "*FUTURE STEALTH CIVILIAN PASSENGER & CARGO AIRLINES AIR TRAVEL AIR SERVICE LLC, DBA,s Id Affix *" ...Vs C.O.P.S. AI sync & Police Public SAFETY :: §§ :: gitLAB`°github.url.cli Vs Coding etc MV transfers e.g. www.go-to.reddit.ymr #91841
  • JIT: Bad codegen with try/finally #91576
    8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Assertion failed in 'System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator:PowCore during 'Generate code' #90693
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] MonoAOT BDN build crashing with SIGABRT #91819
    9.0.0
  • Can native aot run on windows 7? #91830
  • [API Proposal]: High-performance, low-allocation convenience "writer" for Span<T> and Memory<T> #91728
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection NuGet Package Missing README File #86663
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Don't link in debugger component in release mode. #91848
    area-Build-mono
  • Cleanup defines for specialized handle types #91847
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix old gcc build #91845
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary rid argument to dotnet-restore #91844
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono
  • BindConfiguration registers change token source with the right options name #91842
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix invalid zero-init suppression for untracked variables #91840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] [wasm] Remove manual ThrowIfCancellationRequested from ReadAsync response streaming #91834
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Refresh Test #91833
    area-GC-coreclr
  • The IConfiguration.GetSection method will not return null, call the IConfigurationSection.Exists extension method to determine. #91832
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT runtime PAL cleanup #91831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make `BundlerConsistencyTests` stop building/copying self-contained project unnecessarily #91829
    test-enhancement, area-Single-File

Merged

  • ARM64: Enable jumptable to BT optimization #91811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix invalid zero-init suppression for untracked variables #91580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Use g_malloc instead of malloc in giconv.c. #91807
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Avoid an assert when calling X86Base.Pause in non-llvm mode. #91828
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [MT][debugger] Block failing test `MiscTests.TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` #91787
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Test improvements for #8418 on CI #91694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix fgDebugCheckFlags checks for FTN_ADDR #91766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Reduce work done by RuntimeHelpers.TryGetHashCode on Mono #91516
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix case where we illegally optimize away a memory barrier on ARM32/ARM64 #91827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Work around WASI's mmap implementation not returning aligned m… #91761
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable rule CA1869 - Cache and reuse 'JsonSerializerOptions' #90895
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Pass the small size accurately to emitIns_valid_imm_for_ldst_offset #91741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Mark `SString`'s single argument ctors as `explicit` #91822
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Detect aligned read in ReadUnaligned #91813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve binder gen binding logic (init, member binding, polymorphism) #91717
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91688
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Dont' use bareword `bool` in icall sig macros #91808
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Metrics Feature Switch #91767
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
